name: Flame Dude
description:
As a little torch, you have to light a Firebowl on the other side of the Level. Easy as that. Though you shouldn't ignore the fact that you burn off when you are on fire for too long. Just jump into the water to put out yourself and stop from burning completely.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
